name: Roll on, Vampire!
description:
An impossible/rage puzzle game.

Drunk from too much blood a friendly vampire is no longer able to fly through the tunnels of the catacombs back to their home in the depths.

Help them roll their way back home through a gruelling series of challenging obstacles. It almost seems like the catacombs were designed so badly just to make their life more difficult..

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tips

  • Make sure to try switching between 'bat' and 'robe' modes if you're struggling to get past a part of the level.
  • The game is possible to complete.
